enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve resolving keys to fetch data, which can be reused for setting up test data.
The flag method relies on fetching data from fakeValuesService, which can be tested similarly in other methods.
The flag method initializes a ByteBuffer, which can be tested in a similar manner in other methods involving byte manipulation.
The flag method indirectly uses random number generation, which can be tested in conjunction with other methods that require random values.
